players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob was a good guy, I'm sad he's gone."
Diana: "Charlie, I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafioso. Be cautious in your words."
Diana: "Be aware, Charlie is the mafioso. I've found evidence to support this."
Charlie: "Bob was a good guy, I'm sad he's gone."
You: "I'm still trying to figure things out. I'll keep an open mind and listen to everyone's statements."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
